shows.title: Wara
shows.desc: The band name loosely translates as chatty, and Wara has plenty to say: defending migrant rights and freedom of speech, denouncing misleading media and commenting on stories of inequalities and displacement, all against a stereotype-defying, genre-bending blend of sounds - with Cuban salsa, Reggaetón, hip-hop and ska in the mix – that’s guaranteed to make you want to shake your booty.
